Sequence Information.Peptide Name: MDAP-2 (natural AMPs; insects, arthropods, invertebrates, animals)

Literature Information.Literature: Warning: Since the peptide sequence was not reported, the amino acid sequence showed here is a direct translation based on the nucleiotide sequence in the article. Whether the translated sequence corresponds exactly to the natural form remains to be established.Activity: inhibition zone assay: Active against Gram- bacteria E. coli, S. pullorum, and P. multocida (10.5 to 25 mm, 0.05-0.2 mg/mL).Recombinant production:bacteria: a His-tagged Escherichia coli prokaryotic expression system has been established.  Updated 7/2021
Literature Information.Author: Pei Z, Sun X, Tang Y, Zhang D, Gao Y, Ma H.2014
Literature Information.Title: Cloning, expression, and purification of a new antimicrobial peptide gene from Musca domestica larva
